name: Stripe Donation
author: Berg Informatik

sections.installation:
1. Download, unzip and upload to your WordPress plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin within you WordPress Administration Backend
sections.changelog:
• Version 1.2.5
    • Load stripe scripts only when shortcode is present
  • Version 1.2.4
    • Loading animation added
  • Version 1.2.3
    • Stripe API Update
  • Version 1.2.2
    • Stripe php update
  • Version 1.2.1
    • Minor changes
  • Version 1.2.0
    • German Translation added
  • Version 1.1.0
    • Remove settings page
  • Version 1.0.0
    • Initial release
sections.description:
Simply create donation forms and receive payments through stripe.com payment gateway.

Key Features

  • Create unlimited donation forms
  • Customize text and icons
  • Support for multiple currencies
  • Add as many values you like
  • The visitors can donate a custom value

If you need a special integration or custom coding, please visit Woo Agentur or Support WP, Support WP
